ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Another Nerf (but we can't complain about this one!)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Rumor mill has it azaracks have been changed since last patch to be mezzable.  I guess that island wasn t meant to be that hard :P. ... I m pretty certain
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 18 Apr 2000 kim@... wrote:

> You sure it was mez'ed and stood there? It used to be you
> could mez and stun them, and the message would say it
> succeeded, but it would have no effect.

Rumor mill has it azaracks have been changed since last patch to
be mezzable. I guess that island wasn't meant to be that hard :P.

> I found them to be nearly immune to magic/fire/cold, until
> after a molasi. Then I could usually get fire or cold to
> stick (one or the other, seemed to depend on the individual
> azarak).
>

I'm pretty certain their magic resist is horrible. When clerics
and enchanters are nuking for full damage consistently, it's not possible
for it to have high magic resist.

--
Miriana
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
